markdown.markdownText: ![Kubernetes Logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/39/Kubernetes_logo_without_workmark.svg/120px-Kubernetes_logo_without_workmark.svg.png) ### Our Kubernetes dashboard provides comprehensive visibility into the scale, status, and resource utilization of your Kubernetes clusters and its resources. Further reading for Kubernetes monitoring * Best practice for Monitoring Kubernetes with Coralogix * Coralogix Kubernetes integration docs

widgets.title: Total avg Pod CPU utilization by Cluster
Total avg pod memory utilization by Cluster
Avg node CPU utilization [mCPU] by Node
Avg node memory utilization by Node
Node network IO rx / tx [bytes/s] by Node
Node network IO errors rx / tx
System Network Dropped Packets by Node
CPU usage (mCPU) for all pods by namespace [range]
Total memory usage in GiB for all pods by namespace
Total network traffic rx / tx in MB by pods & namespace
Total number of container restarts for all pods by namespace and pod
Total % of CPU throttling for all containers in each namespace & container
widgets.description: Helps identify namespaces & containers where containers are being throttled due to CPU limits

promqlQuery.value: sum by (k8s_namespace_name, container) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total_total{k8s_namespace_name=${k8s_namespace_name}})) / sum by (k8s_namespace_name, container) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total_total{k8s_namespace_name=${k8s_namespace_name}})) * 100
